text: hey everyone, I am new to HubSpot and working through the HubSpot academy for developers course. I was able to configure my local dev environment but when i run the command to upload ("npx hs upload demo-theme demo-theme") it returns an error saying "The path "demo-theme" is not a path to a file or folder". when I run the command I am in the demo-theme directory. Any ideas?
Assuming you’re running the command from within the directory, try `npx hs upload . demo-theme`
that did it. any chance you can explain the difference so I understand for the future? and thank you!

. Is shorthand for upload everything in this directory. 

What you had initially run was looking for a directory called “demo-theme” but you were already in that folder so it couldn't find it. 

Another solution would have been to cd ../ and then run your original command from the demo-theme parent folder. 

Does that make sense?
